column2: for starters I had the sashimi seaweed salad.  While this was good
column3: it was by far the least interesting thing on the table. Husband got the Sashimi Combo with 3 dipping sauces and all three fishes (toro
column5: hamachi) were really excellent quality.  And yes the place is pricey
column6: but I thought the portions were good.  My sweet girlfriend got the Miso Eggplant with Grilled Sushi Rice
column8: and this was TO DIE FOR!  I'm not kidding.  Just the sauce I could've drank.  (Ew
